descriptionHtml:
Another mod that adding to game ponies instead of horse, this time Applejack and Pinkie Pie. To install, copy content of data.7z to your Skyrim folder
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
For those who don\'t want install mod, here\'s gameplay:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AOa8t-boJfk
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I\'ve got those nice models of ponies from deviantart - http://kp-shadowsquirrel.deviantart.com/art/Pony-Model-Download-Center-215266264
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Here\'s Princess Luna http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6569
Here\'s Applejack and Pinkie Pie http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6817
author: zdzichorowerzysta
